short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With Measurementplan and the Extension, you can outline your tracking events directly on the website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Outline your tracking events, right on your website

Struggling to create and store your tracking documentation in: 
🗒️ Messy spreadsheets
✉️ Email conversations
💬 Teams or Slack chats

Measurementplan chrome extension features:
🌐 Snap key interactions and screenshot right where your events occur
🪄 Create standard or custom tracking events with 1-click
📈 Extend the lifetime of your digital analytics implementation
🔗 Plan better, together – Easily share with your team

Measurementplan is a service designed for businesses to easily visualize their digital analytics event structure. With our platform you can seamlessly view screenshots of your website alongside your tracking events. All in one convenient place.
